message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, let's meet in the middle. This is my counter-offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
Time is running out, and the value is decreasing. I'm increasing my offer again to show I'm serious about reaching a deal.
I'm still not convinced, and I think we can do better. Meet me in the middle of our last offers.
Alice, this is a very reasonable offer and very close to your last one. Let's close this deal while there's still real value left on the table.
